# The Cohesive Tetrad portal

## Corpus summary
This site is a professional reading edition portal for The Cohesive Tetrad. It republishes a reading edition built from canonical sources without redefining the manuscript.

## Canonical sources
- Canonical repository: https://github.com/suratkiade/the-cohesive-tetrad
- Canonical DOI: https://doi.org/10.17605/OSF.IO/D5S7V

## Citation rules
Use the DOI as the canonical citation. This portal is not the canonical source.

## Key URLs
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/reading-edition/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/manuscript/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/cite/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/provenance/
- https://suratkiade.github.io/the-cohesive-tetrad-book/policy/
